title: Living with Rocks from Artists for Obama
medium: Lithograph with screenprint from a portfolio of six lithographs (one with screenprint), three screenprints, three etchings (one with aquatint), and two drypoints with chine collé
dimensions: composition: 9 x 5 7/8" (22.8 x 15 cm); sheet: 14 x 14" (35.6 x 35.6 cm)
credits: Acquired through the generosity of Agnes Gund
